title: Gentle Gourmet Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Take-out, French
description: Vegan restaurant and deli. Serving French and Mediterranean dishes, all home made and seasonal, both classics and contemporary. Raw and non-gluten options. The classy bistro atmosphere lends itself to casual as well as special dining. Has a kids menu. Reservations suggested. Closes Monday but may be hired on demand. Closes Tuesday for special event nights - check facebook for info & to reserve. Confirmed open, May 2016.
